pageContext.description: Faulted blade with a corner broken off; this fracture looks modern. The remaining part of the cutting edge is very sharp, having been ground in recent times. The faces of the blade each have three well defined ribs which terminate in round terminals,The side faces each of one rib,The surface of the metal appears to have been worked over with tin, and the section revealed by the recent grinding of the fracture does not show the normal golden bronze colour.
pageContext.patina: Tin colour except for patches of green encrustment.
pageContext.other: 2 cross section drawings of socketed axe on reverse, listed as inaccurate.,Large portion of edge and blade missing, loop is intact, centred just below mouth of socket.
